body_html:
It generates an error if a variable is undefined. That's good for spotting typos. You can set -u in the script. The style guide mandates -eu, but -e which causes the script to end on any non success command is too harsh in that case
…

body:
It generates an error if a variable is undefined. That's good for spotting
typos. You can set -u in the script.

The style guide mandates -eu, but -e which causes the script to end on any
non success command is too harsh in that case
